films.title: Interstellar
films.summary: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

films.title: Inception
films.summary: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

films.title: The Dark Knight
films.summary: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

films.title: Pulp Fiction
films.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

films.title: The Matrix
films.summary: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

films.title: Forrest Gump
films.summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

films.title: Fight Club
films.summary: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

films.title: The Shawshank Redemption
films.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

films.title: The Godfather
films.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

films.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
films.summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
